title: Conjuration Spells
content: m the ground, slowing creatures within and possibly Entangling them.18m 2m DEX Save Concentration Druid Find Familiar Lv 1 Conjuration ActionSpell Slot Gain the service of a familiar, a fey spirit that takes an animal from of your choose.18m Wizard, Ranger, Fighter (Eldritch Knight), Warlock Find Familiar: Cat Lv 1 Conjuration ActionSpell Slot Summon a familiar with the form and statistics of a cat that can distract your enemies.(Lasts until the end of a long rest)18m Wizard Find Familiar: Crab
